SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, M.USER_ID AS REPLY_WRITER, R.CREATE_DATE, R.STATUS FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REPLY_WRITER = M.USER_NO WHERE REF_BNO = #{bno} AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, COUNT, CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_CD = #{boardCode} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, COUNT, BOARD_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{bno}

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, USER_ID AS BOARD_WRITER, COUNT, B.CREATE_DATE, ORIGIN_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BOARD_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_CD = #{boardCode}
AND
BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${keyword}%'
BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${keyword}%'

USER_ID LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT SUBSTR(CHANGE_NAME,INSTR(CHANGE_NAME,'/',1,2)+1) FROM BOARD WHERE ORIGIN_NAME IS NOT NULL
